snippet: After close relations for more than 70 years, has President Obama ‘unfriended’ Saudi Arabia over issues such as Iran, Syria and oil? It’s complicated.
abstract: Pres Obama's upcoming meeting with King Salman of Saudi Arabia is likely to be strained after years of discord, sown during Obama's tenure, threatens longtime alliance; analysis of both countries' goals for meeting and concerns for future highlighted.
lead_paragraph: After close relations for more than 70 years, has President Obama ‘unfriended’ Saudi Arabia over issues such as Iran, Syria and oil? It’s complicated.

headline.main: An Old Alliance Faces New Pressures as Obama Heads to Saudi Arabia
headline.print_headline: An Old Alliance Faces New Pressures as Obama Heads to Saudi Arabia
